body_html:
FYI Unrefing the tensor_array object after getting them out of the resource_mgr seemed to do the trick for me - https://github.com/awni/tensorflow/commit/af8bef11151ff98137c9b5ce1a27e543f311e7d9

I can PR this if it looks like the right fix.
body_text:
FYI Unrefing the tensor_array object after getting them out of the resource_mgr seemed to do the trick for me - https://github.com/awni/tensorflow/commit/af8bef11151ff98137c9b5ce1a27e543f311e7d9
I can PR this if it looks like the right fix.
body:
FYI `Unref`ing the `tensor_array` object after getting them out of the `resource_mgr` seemed to do the trick for me - https://github.com/awni/tensorflow/commit/af8bef11151ff98137c9b5ce1a27e543f311e7d9

I can PR this if it looks like the right fix.
